Please help to improve this article by introducing more precise citations. *(November 2011)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* The **Church of Our Lady of Lourdes** ([Tamil](/wiki/Tamil_language): தூய லூர்து அன்னை ஆலயம்) is a [Catholic](/wiki/Catholic) [church](/wiki/Church_(building)) in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It is located at [Ophir Road](/wiki/Ophir_Road) in the Rochor Planning Area, within the [Central Area](/wiki/Central_Area,_Singapore) in Singapore's [central business district](/wiki/Central_business_district). ## History The Church of Our Lady of Lourdes was blessed and officially opened in 1888. This is the first [Tamil](/wiki/Tamil_people) [Catholic church](/wiki/Catholic_church) in Singapore. The building site was obtained in 1885 and the cornerstone laid on 1 August 1886 by Bishop Gasnier, D.D. and Sir Frederick A. Weld, G. C M. G in an official ceremony that was witnessed by a number of religious and laity. It bears a resemblance to the [Sanctuary of Our Lady of Lourdes](/wiki/Sanctuary_of_Our_Lady_of_Lourdes), in [France](/wiki/France). Within the Church building itself is a grotto with life-sized statues depicting the appearance of [Our Lady](/wiki/Blessed_Virgin_Mary_(Roman_Catholic)) appearing to [Saint Bernadette](/wiki/Saint_Bernadette). Masses are held in English, [Tamil](/wiki/Tamil_language) and [Sinhalese](/wiki/Sinhalese_language). The Church of Our Lady of Lourdes was [gazetted](/wiki/Gazette) as a [national monument](/wiki/National_Monuments_of_Singapore) on 14 January 2005. As a national monument, it was given funding from the National Monuments Fund, administrated by the [National Heritage Board](/wiki/National_Heritage_Board_(Singapore)), in 2016 for renovation works. ## Architecture In 2009, the church building underwent restoration works to resemble the original church at a budget of S$1.75 million. It was completed in October 2010. - Norman Edwards, Peter Keys (1988), *Singapore – A Guide to Buildings, Streets, Places*, Times Books International, [ISBN](/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)) 9971-65-231-5 - Wan Meng Hao (2005), *Know Our Monuments* , Preservation of Monuments Board - Singapore Catholic Church Directory - Parish of Our Lady of Lourdes, Singapore - Infopedia
